creator: java@liberger.com
text:
It would be nice to have a way to set a duration assert on a group of samplers,
that "assert that these requests dont take more than X seconds in total response
time"

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Try adding a transaction controller as parent of the samplers, and then apply 
the duration assertion to that. Does that work for you?

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: This can now be done using the Transaction Controller
